SELECT i.*, d1.valueName as flatformName, d2.valueName as statusName, c1.categoryName as categoryLevel1Name, c2.categoryName as categoryLevel2Name, c3.categoryName as categoryLevel3Name, v.versionNo FROM app_info i LEFT JOIN data_dictionary d1 ON i.flatformId = d1.valueId LEFT JOIN data_dictionary d2 ON i.`status` = d2.valueId LEFT JOIN app_category c1 on i.categoryLevel1=c1.id LEFT JOIN app_category c2 on i.categoryLevel2=c2.id LEFT JOIN app_category c3 on i.categoryLevel3=c3.id LEFT JOIN app_version v on i.versionId =v.Id where d2.typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' AND d1.typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM'
and i.id= #{id}
